name: Towers of undead
description:
Towers of undead is a simple strategic game where you command your skeleton army to defeat demons! Every unit can be revived as enemy if it's strong enough!

Some information before playing:
Coins can be collected every once in a while or by defeating demons.
Wallet upgrading increase coins collection.
Body increases health and size of skeletons but lowers their mobility.
Legs upgrades make skeletons run faster.
Weapon become heavier with every upgrade, so it deals more damage but swings become slower.
 Arms allow skeletons to hit faster.
Armor absrobs some damage.

Every upgrade costs more and more when you upgrade it. Spawning a skeleton becomes more expensive too.

Have fun!
